T02D2203:143b-1: badzra p'a ni n'i l'am ba ra dha ra n'a ma tantra t'i k'a //
T02D2203:144a-1: rdo rje gos sngon po can zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgya cher bshad /
T02D2203:144a-2: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2203:144a-3: de nas 'phags pa gos sngon can gyis lcang lo can gyi pho brang du //
T02D2203:144a-4: 'khor gnod sbyin la sogs pa la de'i tshe 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
T02D2203:144a-5: rdo rje be con bshad pa la //
T02D2203:144a-6: bsdus pa'i las ni rnam pa lnga //
T02D2203:144a-7: bsnyen bsgrub gsad dang dbye ba dang //
T02D2203:144a-8: dman pa'i las te rnam pa lnga //
T02D2203:144a-9: bsnyen pa'i las ni 'di lta ste //
T02D2203:144a-10: yid 'ong dga' ba'i sa phyogs su //
T02D2203:144a-11: stegs bu me tog gcal bkram ste //
T02D2203:144a-12: khro bo'i sku gzugs gzhag par bya ;
T02D2203:144a-13: / de la yan lag brgyad ldan pa'i //
T02D2203:144a-14: sngags kyi bsnyen pa rab tu 'bad //
T02D2203:144a-16: shin tu sku gzugs 'dzum pa dang //
T02D2203:144a-17: me tog sngon po 'thu ba dang //
T02D2203:144a-18: gnod sbyin sde dpon byed pa dang //
T02D2203:144a-19: gos sngon rtag tu gon pa dang //
T02D2203:144a-20: rdo rje lag tu thogs pa dang ;
T02D2203:144a-21: / rgya mtshor rkang pa bskyod pa dang //
T02D2203:144a-22: ri rab klad la bskor ba dang /
T02D2203:144a-23: rus sbal lag gis len pa dang //
T02D2203:144a-24: sprul brgyad lus la brgyan ba dang //
T02D2203:144a-25: rtag tu dam chos ston pa 'byung //
T02D2203:144a-26: de nas bsgrub pa brtsam par bya //
T02D2203:144a-27: sgrub pa byed pa rnam gnyis te //
T02D2203:144a-28: spyi yi sgrub dang bye brag sgrub ;
T02D2203:144a-29: / bye brag sgrub pa 'di lta ste //
T02D2203:144a-30: bdag dang gzhan dang thun mong ngo //
T02D2203:144a-31: bdag gi don ni bshad bya ba //
T02D2203:144a-32: me brgyad 'khor lo sangs rgyas ldan //
T02D2203:144a-33: rkang mthil gnyis dang dpyi mig gnyis //
T02D2203:144a-34: lag mthil gnyis dang mgrin pa mdoms //
T02D2203:144a-35: de re ram las mi bskyed pa /
T02D2203:144a-36: rlung gnyis 'bras bu sa bon ldan //
T02D2203:144a-37: me brgyad 'khor lo rab bsgoms nas //
T02D2203:144a-38: de nyid sngags la rab 'bad na //
T02D2203:144a-40: bcu gcig pa yis klu srin 'bros //
T02D2203:144a-41: zla gcig tu snyoms zhugs na //
T02D2203:144a-43: ci phyir nga sngon drag po yis //
T02D2203:144a-44: bsdu ba'i ting 'dzin rnam par bsgoms //
T02D2203:144a-46: me bsgoms me yi sngags bzlas pas //
T02D2203:144a-48: bsdus nas bdud rtsi dri med gsos //
T02D2203:144a-49: mi gnas pa ru rnam par bsgom //
T02D2203:144b-0: @144b de bzhin de la 'bad par bya //
T02D2203:144b-1: chu brgyad 'khor lo sangs rgyas ldan //
T02D2203:144b-2: klad pa mgrin pa dpung mgo gnyis //
T02D2203:144b-3: snyid ga lte ba bral gnyis su //
T02D2203:144b-4: yi ge bam las chu bskyed pas //
T02D2203:144b-5: bdud rtsir bcas pas 'bras bur ldan //
T02D2203:144b-6: chu brgyad 'khor lor rab bsgoms nas /
T02D2203:144b-7: de nyid sngags la rab 'bad nas //
T02D2203:144b-8: lan cig bco brgyad chu yis ni //
T02D2203:144b-9: skyon dag bag chags dag par 'gyur //
T02D2203:144b-10: ci phyir nga sngon zhi ba yis //
T02D2203:144b-11: bag chags ngan pa'i nyen gyis zin //
T02D2203:144b-12: chu brgyad chu yi sngags bzlas pas //
T02D2203:144b-13: dag pas kun dga' grol bar 'gyur //
T02D2203:144b-14: rlung brgyad 'khor lo sangs rgyas ldan ;
T02D2203:144b-15: / gong ma'i gnas brgyad yam las bskyed //
T02D2203:144b-16: me gnyis yang dag 'bras mchog de //
T02D2203:144b-17: thal bar 'gyur la gdon mi za //
T02D2203:144b-18: de yang drag po'i drag po'o //
T02D2203:144b-19: sa brgyad 'khor lo'i sangs rgyas ldan //
T02D2203:144b-20: gnas brgyad lam las sa grub pa //
T02D2203:144b-21: grub bzhi h'um ni 'bras bur ldan ;
T02D2203:144b-22: / steng du 'phags pa gos sngon brgyad //
T02D2203:144b-23: dngos grub thams cad ldan byed pa'i //
T02D2203:144b-24: 'khor lo brgyad kyi rnam pa ni //
T02D2203:144b-25: dam tshig 'khor lo de bzhin te //
T02D2203:144b-26: ji bzhin ye shes 'khor lo yang //
T02D2203:144b-27: de bzhin mdun na rnam par spro //
T02D2203:144b-28: sangs rgyas mdzad pa rdzogs phyir ro //
T02D2203:144b-29: gal te gzhan la sgrub na ni //
T02D2203:144b-30: rang nyid ji bzhin gos sngon can //
T02D2203:144b-31: gnod sbyin nyen gyis zin gyur na //
T02D2203:144b-33: sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dgod //
T02D2203:144b-34: bu mo lo brgyad lon pa la //
T02D2203:144b-35: yan lag brgyad spros dris byugs nas //
T02D2203:144b-36: rin chen bum pa skus dbang bskur ;
T02D2203:144b-37: / de nyid dbus nas gzungs thag 'dren //
T02D2203:144b-38: bzlas yungs gzungs sngags stong bzlas la //
T02D2203:144b-39: bdag nyid kha nas chu gtor bas //
T02D2203:144b-40: nad pa'i lus la chu brgyad bsgom //
T02D2203:144b-41: phral nas ji bzhin chu gtor bas //
T02D2203:144b-42: rdo rje khad pa khro bcur ldan //
T02D2203:144b-43: klu dang dpral ba'i las byed pa //
T02D2203:144b-44: slob ma med la mnyam gzhag ste //
T02D2203:144b-45: slob dpon gos sngon ting nge 'dzin ldan //
T02D2203:144b-47: steng du cha gsum rigs drug dgod //
T02D2203:144b-48: nad pa'i lus la sna tshogs dgod //
T02D2203:144b-49: smyo gshang yang na bal po se'u //
T02D2203:144b-50: bya khyung ga rur byin gyis brlab //
T02D2203:145a-1: sngags gzir ba'i gsang sngags kyis //
T02D2203:145a-2: nad pa'i lus la bra ba cing gzir //
T02D2203:145a-3: lcags kyus mdun bkod steng du blang //
T02D2203:145a-4: de sos gyur na gnas su bskyal //
T02D2203:145a-5: khrus kyi dus na chu brgyad bsgom //
T02D2203:145a-6: tshe yi dus nas brgyad bsgom //
T02D2203:145a-7: phral ba'i rjes su rlung brgyad bsgom //
T02D2203:145a-8: yi dgas brjed byed bzlog 'dod na /
T02D2203:145a-9: tshon sna lnga yi skud pa lnga //
T02D2203:145a-10: bgegs gnyis bzlog pa'i sngags bzlas shing //
T02D2203:145a-11: mdud pa sngags bcas re re la //
T02D2203:145a-12: ye shes gos sngon re re bstim //
T02D2203:145a-13: thim 'gyur skud pa mgul btags na //
T02D2203:145a-14: yi dgas nyen rnams bzlog par 'gyur //
T02D2203:145a-15: nad kyi tshogs rnams bzlog 'dod na //
T02D2203:145a-16: skud pa dkar po dag bkrus te //
T02D2203:145a-17: me tog sngon pos mdog bsgyur la //
T02D2203:145a-18: sngags spel na sar btags na 'tsho //
T02D2203:145a-19: byis pa gdon las srung 'dod na /
T02D2203:145a-20: skud pa gong dang 'dra ba la /
T02D2203:145a-21: sngags bzlas bsrung ba'i mdud pa bya //
T02D2203:145a-22: thim nas byas pa'i mgul dug dgas //
T02D2203:145a-23: bsam gtan khro bo'i khang bar gzhug / nor 'dong bdag bsgrub bya ste //
T02D2203:145a-24: klu rnams byang shar mtshams su dgug / gtso bo'i sngags kyi khams gsum rgyal //
T02D2203:145a-25: bkrol la khro bo khams gsum rgyal //
T02D2203:145a-26: rnam thos sras la nor sbyin bsgom //
T02D2203:145a-27: rmi lam gser gyi dong tshe ster //
T02D2203:145a-28: snod stong dkon mchog gsum la bsngo //
T02D2203:145a-29: gang ba dag gis dkon mchog go //
T02D2203:145a-30: gsang pa'i las ni 'di lta ste //
T02D2203:145a-31: gang la bya ba'i dgra bo de'i //
T02D2203:145a-32: gzugs byas ste du dbab byas nas //
T02D2203:145a-33: lcags sam sngon po'i shing phur la //
T02D2203:145a-34: gos sngon drag por byin brlabs te //
T02D2203:145a-35: drag po'i gsang sngags bzlas shing gdab //
T02D2203:145a-36: thebs pa'i lus la sbrul nag gi / zhags pas bcings la gzhag byas nas /
T02D2203:145a-37: snying nang klu yi dkyil 'khor dgod //
T02D2203:145a-38: klu yod chu mig nang du sbas //
T02D2203:145a-39: des ni myur du gsod pa'o //
T02D2203:145a-40: dbye ba'i las ni 'di lta ste //
T02D2203:145a-41: thams cad dbye ba gong bzhin no //
T02D2203:145a-42: bsgrub byas lha dang dbra 'dod na //
T02D2203:145a-43: 'og tu sme ba'i dud pa gtor //
T02D2203:145a-45: bdag nyid drag po'i sngags bzlas pa //
T02D2203:145a-46: sngags kyi sprul pa sna tshogs spros //
T02D2203:145a-47: sprul pa drag bo'i khro tshogs kyis //
T02D2203:145b-1: drag po'i mtshon cha'i thog phab pas //
T02D2203:145b-2: dus mtha' med cing drag shul che //
T02D2203:145b-4: man na la ri rab chen po bas //
T02D2203:145b-5: sems ni ri rab dran pas gnon //
T02D2203:145b-6: dag ni ri rab smra bas gnon //
T02D2203:145b-7: lus ni ri rab g-yo 'gul gnon ;
T02D2203:145b-8: / phyag na rdo rje be co na can gyi
T02D2203:145b-9: rgyud phyi ma las rtog pa dang po rdzogs so
T02D2203:145b-11: // // de nas yang dag nge pa'i don ni rab bshad pa //
T02D2203:145b-12: dpal ldan gos sngon gsang ba'i bdag po khro bo'i sku //
T02D2203:145b-13: rgyud rnams kun gyi sdud pa bor ni rab grags kyang //
T02D2203:145b-14: 'khor gyi klu rnams ma lus 'dul phyir ston pa mdzad //
T02D2203:145b-15: de dag ji srid don la ni //
T02D2203:145b-16: yang dag gsang bdag gos sngon can //
T02D2203:145b-17: rnal 'byor don la rab gnas nas //
T02D2203:145b-18: bla med 'khor lo'i don gsungs pa //
T02D2203:145b-19: kye ho sgrol ba byed pa can //
T02D2203:145b-20: chags par ba tu bde ba che //
T02D2203:145b-22: rtag chad gnyis stong bde ba che //
T02D2203:145b-23: yang dag blan med pa'i klong //
T02D2203:145b-24: thams cad stong du cha gcig ste //
T02D2203:145b-25: mi gnas ma bral 'dus ma byas //
T02D2203:145b-26: bla med gos sngon mtshan nyid do //
T02D2203:145b-27: gsung dang bsdus pa'i rgyud rnams //
T02D2203:145b-28: grangs las 'das shing brjod du med //
T02D2203:145b-29: mdor bsdus rnam pa bzhin ru bstan //
T02D2203:145b-30: rtsa pa'i rgyud dang brtag pa'i rgyud //
T02D2203:145b-31: bshad pa'i rgyud dang phi rgyud ma /
T02D2203:145b-32: ston pa yid kyis rgyud 'di yang //
T02D2203:145b-33: gdul bya'i dbang du gsungs pa ste /
T02D2203:145b-34: klu 'dul dbang du gos sngon can //
T02D2203:145b-35: ma mo 'dul phyir ro sangs rgyud //
T02D2203:145b-36: gshin rje 'dul phyir gcer bu'i rgyud //
T02D2203:145b-37: bdud chen 'dul phyir gying chen rgyud //
T02D2203:145b-38: gza' chen 'dul phyir thugs gsang rgyud //
T02D2203:145b-41: dgra bo 'dul phyir gnod byed rgyud //
T02D2203:145b-42: gnod sbyin 'dul phyir 'chi ba dag rgyud //
T02D2203:145b-43: gdul bya dgu yi dbang du ni //
T02D2203:145b-44: ston pa dgu yis rgyud dgu gsungs //
T02D2203:145b-45: ston pa dgu yang gcig yin te //
T02D2203:145b-46: gcig nyid bde gshegs sprul pa'o //
T02D2203:145b-47: phyag na rdo rje be con can gyi rgyud phyi ma las rtog pa gnyis pa rdzogs so /
T02D2203:145b-49: // /'di skad bstan pa'i dus gcig na //
T02D2203:145b-50: stong gsum stong gi 'jig rten khams //
T02D2203:146a-2: sbrul ba'i rgyud dang ji snyed de //
T02D2203:146a-3: shin tu khro ba gdug cing gtum //
T02D2203:146a-4: ji lta ba yis thogs med sku //
T02D2203:146a-5: dbang bskur gsang ba'i bdag po yin //
T02D2203:146a-6: ji ltar khro bo'i dbang bskur ba //
T02D2203:146a-7: dbang thob phyag na rdo rje yin //
T02D2203:146a-8: mthu dang gzi brjid khyad par 'phags ;
T02D2203:146a-9: / ji ltar zhi ba'i skur bstan kyang //
T02D2203:146a-10: thams cad zhi ba'i bdag nyid che //
T02D2203:146a-11: dkar po rdo rje 'dzin pa che //
T02D2203:146a-12: byang chub mang pos 'khor du bskor //
T02D2203:146a-13: ji ltar rgyas pa'i skur bstan yang //
T02D2203:146a-14: thams cad rgyas pa'i bdag nyid che //
T02D2203:146a-15: ser la sdang ba'i rin chen bdag / gshin rje'i tshogs kyis 'khor du bskor //
T02D2203:146a-16: de ltar dbang gi skur bstan kyang //
T02D2203:146a-17: thams cad dbang gi bdag nyid che //
T02D2203:146a-18: dmar nag padma'i kha dog thogs //
T02D2203:146a-19: klu tshogs mang pos 'khor du bskor //
T02D2203:146a-20: ji ltar drag po'i skur bstan kyang //
T02D2203:146a-21: thams cad drag po'i bdag nyid che //
T02D2203:146a-22: sngo nag rdo rje dbyug to 'phyar //
T02D2203:146a-23: lha srin sde brgyad 'khor du bskor //
T02D2203:146a-24: gsang ba'i bdag po gos sngon yang //
T02D2203:146a-25: rim par mngon par byang chub pas //
T02D2203:146a-26: bla med byang chub chen po brnyes //
T02D2203:146a-27: yang dag thogs med 'gro don byed //
T02D2203:146a-28: 'khor lo thar lam rnam dag nas //
T02D2203:146a-29: yang dag gsang ba'i thig le las //
T02D2203:146a-30: aas brgyan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam //
T02D2203:146a-31: de steng yi ge h'um nag bsam //
T02D2203:146a-32: h'um de kun gyis byin brlabs pas //
T02D2203:146a-33: rdo rje nag po h'um 'bar ldan //
T02D2203:146a-34: rdo rje kun gyis byin brlabs pa //
T02D2203:146a-35: sku gnyis grub pa'i bdag nyid che //
T02D2203:146a-36: mngon par khro bo'i bzlas pa bya //
T02D2203:146a-37: dpral ba mgrin pa mig gnyis dang //
T02D2203:146a-38: rna ba lus la sogs pa ru //
T02D2203:146a-39: phyag na rdo rje sa snying po //
T02D2203:146a-40: nam mkha'i snying po spyan ras gzigs //
T02D2203:146a-41: ming gi yi ge dang por bskyed //
T02D2203:146a-42: bde gshegs gsang bar byin brlabs pas //
T02D2203:146a-44: spyi bo snying ga mgrin pa dang //
T02D2203:146a-45: lte ba gsang ba gnas lnga ru //
T02D2203:146a-46: mi bskyod rnam snang rin po che //
T02D2203:146a-47: snang ba mtha' yas don yod grub //
T02D2203:146a-48: ming gi yi ge dang por bskyed //
T02D2203:146a-49: byin brlabs rigs lnga khros par bskyed //
T02D2203:146a-50: mig gnyis phyi rol me dpung nang //
T02D2203:146a-51: gos sngon khros pa mtshon gang bskyed //
T02D2203:146b-0: de ni @146b 'byung po 'dul ba'i mchog / snying nang gsang bdag gos sngon can //
T02D2203:146b-1: rdo rje dbyug to thogs pa sngo //
T02D2203:146b-2: de yi snying nad rdo rje gnag / zla ba'i gdan la bsam par bya //
T02D2203:146b-3: de dbus h'um las sngags kyis bskor //
T02D2203:146b-4: de yi 'od kyis bskul nas ni //
T02D2203:146b-5: bde bar gshegs pa spyan drangs nas /
T02D2203:146b-6: mdun na gnas la gsol gad ba cing //
T02D2203:146b-7: de yis bdag nyid byin brlabs 'gyur //
T02D2203:146b-8: de nas gsang sngags bzlas brjod bya //
T02D2203:146b-9: myur du nyen las thar ba dang //
T02D2203:146b-10: thugs rjes rmi lam lung ston 'gyur //
T02D2203:146b-11: ma lus dbang du bsdu bas 'grub //
T02D2203:146b-12: phyag na rdo rje be con can gyi rgyud phyi ma las rtog pa gsum pa rdzogs so /
T02D2203:146b-14: // /'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig na //
T02D2203:146b-15: drag po 'bar ba'i gzhal yas su //
T02D2203:146b-16: dpal ldan gos sngon dkyil 'khor ldan //
T02D2203:146b-17: dbus na dpal ldan gos sngon ldan //
T02D2203:146b-18: sngon po rdo rje dbyug to bsnams //
T02D2203:146b-19: g-yas phyogs h'um las dpal ldan mgon ;
T02D2203:146b-20: / nag po gri gug thod pa thogs //
T02D2203:146b-21: mche gtsigs mgo phreng do shal byas //
T02D2203:146b-22: mdun du h'um las khams gsum rgyal //
T02D2203:146b-23: dmar gnag thod dbyug sdigs mdzub thogs //
T02D2203:146b-24: mche gtsigs stag gi sham thabs can //
T02D2203:146b-25: g-yon du bee las rnam thos sras //
T02D2203:146b-26: ljang ser be con zhags pa bsnams //
T02D2203:146b-27: ha ha 'byin cing drag por bcas //
T02D2203:146b-28: rgyab tu na las mig mi bzang //
T02D2203:146b-29: sngo gnag ral gri sprul zhags bsnams //
T02D2203:146b-30: mche ba gtsigs shing shin tu 'jigs //
T02D2203:146b-31: 'khor lo'i rtsibs kyi phyi mchan na //
T02D2203:146b-32: spos dang me tog mar me dri //
T02D2203:146b-33: ji bzhin phyogs su dgod par bya //
T02D2203:146b-34: sgeg mo phreng dang dbyangs can gar //
T02D2203:146b-35: nang gi mtshams la dgod par bya //
T02D2203:146b-36: aom na mo buddha dharma sam ghe bhya:/
T02D2203:146b-37: ai dam pu shpe/ dh'u be /
T02D2203:146b-39: a'a lo ke ba lim ta p'u dza me ghas mu dra spha ra nas ma ye h'um /
T02D2203:146b-40: aom na mo n'i l'a mba rdha ra badzra p'a ni /
T02D2203:146b-44: a'a lo ke / ba lim ta p'u dza me gha h'um /
T02D2203:146b-45: aom na mo ma h'a k'a la h'um /
T02D2203:146b-49: a'a lo ke h'um aom na ma:tree lo kya bi dza ya h'um //
T02D2203:146b-51: aom na mo bi r'u pa k'a ye h'um /
T02D2203:146b-53: aom na mo bi r'u dha ka ye h'um /
T02D2203:146b-55: ae hye hi ma h'a bo dhi satva ming dang ldan /
T02D2203:146b-56: dza: h'um bam ho:mthar ldan pa //
T02D2203:147a-2: / phyag na rdo rje be con can gyi rgyud phyi ma las rtog pa bzhi pa rdzogs so /
T02D2203:147a-4: // /'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig na //
T02D2203:147a-5: rdo rje gdan gyi rtse mo la /
T02D2203:147a-6: gnod sbyin tshogs rnams ma lus te //
T02D2203:147a-7: drag po rtog pa chen po 'di //
T02D2203:147a-8: rdo rje sgeg mi'i rtog par gsungs //
T02D2203:147a-9: gsang sngags bskul ba'i mtha' dang ldan //
T02D2203:147a-10: rtsa sngags dag la ming ldan pa //
T02D2203:147a-11: las sngags mtha' ma bsgyur mthar ldan //
T02D2203:147a-12: de yis las kun byed ba'i mchog / phyag na rdo rje khro bo'i sku //
T02D2203:147a-13: de nyid gzhan min bdag nyid sku //
T02D2203:147a-14: de ldan drag po'i thog chen 'bebs //
T02D2203:147a-15: gsang sngags ting 'dzin rab ldan na //
T02D2203:147a-16: phebs par 'gyur bar gdon mi za //
T02D2203:147a-18: n'i l'a mba ra ma h'a yaksha h'um phat /
T02D2203:147a-28: ta th'a ya ta th'a ya badzra /
T02D2203:147a-29: ha sa ya na ha sa ya na badzra /
T02D2203:147a-30: bri h'um aa na ya badzra /
T02D2203:147a-33: n'i l'a mba ra ma h'a yaksha h'um phat /
T02D2203:147a-34: lce dang dbang bo khro bo dang //
T02D2203:147a-36: khams gsum myur du sgrol bar 'gyur //
T02D2203:147a-37: ae ma gsang sngags ngo mtshar che //
T02D2203:147a-38: phyag na rdo rje be con can gyi rgyud phyi ma las rtog pa lnga pa rdzogs so //
T02D2203:147a-40: // 'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig na //
T02D2203:147a-41: lha mo ro langs dkyil 'khor du //
T02D2203:147a-42: lha mo'i tshogs dang ldan cig tu //
T02D2203:147a-43: lha mo rnams kyis legs bstod pa //
T02D2203:147a-44: klu rnams 'dul ba'i mthu stobs can //
T02D2203:147a-45: dpal ldan gos sngon phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2203:147a-46: drag shul sku ni khros pa'i chas //
T02D2203:147a-48: khams gsum gdug pa kun sgrol zhing //
T02D2203:147a-49: klu rnams 'dul mdzad gos sngon khyod phyag 'tshal //
T02D2203:147a-50: ae ma brjod 'das drag thul gsung /
T02D2203:147a-51: gang rgyangs dgod cing 'od zer 'khyug / klu tshogs 'dul ba'i gsung 'chang ba //
T02D2203:147a-52: sna tshogs drag po gsum la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2203:147a-53: ae ma mi dmigs dmigs pa che //
T02D2203:147a-54: rnam par dag las rab grub bas //
T02D2203:147a-55: ma lus dmigs med phra mo'i bdag /'od 'byung thugs la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2203:147b-1: / mtshan dang dpe byad khyad par 'phags //
T02D2203:147b-2: yon tan sna tshogs brjod las 'das //
T02D2203:147b-3: bla med gos sngon khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2203:147b-4: thogs pa me ba'i sku brnyes nas //
T02D2203:147b-5: zhes rgyas dbang drag las rnams kun //
T02D2203:147b-6: sku gsung thugs kyis thogs med 'grub //
T02D2203:147b-7: thogs med gos sngon phyag 'tshal bstod //
T02D2203:147b-8: h'um bskyed nag po mgon bo ste //
T02D2203:147b-9: gri gug phyag na snod thogs shing //
T02D2203:147b-10: snang ba dpal mgon thugs su sgrol //
T02D2203:147b-12: phyag na rdo rje be con can gyi rgyud phyi ma las rtog pa bsdus pa rdzogs so /
T02D2203:147b-14: // / rgyud kyi rgyal po rdo rje be con gos sngon can gyi rgyud //
T02D2203:147b-15: gu ya r'u pa'i zhal snga nas ni legs bsgyur bas //
T02D2203:147b-16: mkha' 'gro'i gling nas dum bu brgyad du legs bris pa //
T02D2203:147b-17: de yi bshad rgyud 'bum phrag phyed dang sum stong las ni phyung ba yin //
